tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audio_metadata (
    audio_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    audio_file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    audio_length FLOAT NOT NULL,
    audio_format VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    audio_size INT NOT NULL,
    sample_rate INT NOT NULL,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE AudioFiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    duration_seconds INT,
    file_size_bytes INT
);

CREATE TABLE AudioFiles (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    file_format VARCHAR(50),
    duration_minutes FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AudioTranscriptions (
    transcription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id INT,
    transcription_text TEXT,
    transcription_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES AudioFiles(file_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AudioModels (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    model_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_data_path VARCHAR(255),
    accuracy_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE audio_files (
    file_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_size INT,
    duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE speakers (
    speaker_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    speaker_name VARCHAR(100),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    gender CHAR(1),
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE audio_files (
    audio_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    file_size INT NOT NULL,
    duration FLOAT,
    sample_rate INT
);

CREATE TABLE recordings (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    audio_id INT NOT NULL,
    speaker_id INT NOT NULL,
    lang_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
